name: Bless the Last Ones
description:
They were the last ones, you were their dying god. One hundred seconds is all that remained to you. To cause havoc, and laughter, and transformations.
Maybe vampires.
Maybe love.

An absurdist narrative sandbox with lots of variables and multiple endings.
[made in three days for Ludum Dare 51]

Content warning: mild nudity, profanity, some very bad jokes.


Daniele Giardini (aka Demigiant) - Game design, writing, coding, music
Jelena Đorđević (aka Jelena) - Art


Just the mouse. Clickety, click.
